revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=EBR-2310 |revision=A1 |upc=790069288661 |ean= |asin=B000GVTX6U;US; |price= |est_release_date=2005 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Global Sun |manuf_model=GLWRT-CG3 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88E6218;88E6218-LG0, B30796.2, 0531 B1P, TW; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CPLD;Altera;EPM3032A;;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:15:E9 }} [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/27267-cheaprouterroundup?showall=&start=3 On '''SmallNetBuilder''''s ''Cheap Router Roundup'' circa 2006] :"GLWRT-CG3-B10", "GLWRT-CG3", "VER:V1.0", and a date code of '''0543''' is silkscreened on the board. This is a '''Global Sun Tech''' manuf'ed device (and equiv. to the [[D-Link DI-604 rev E2]]).
